channel.title: Npc's hit to high
channel.description: On my server when I attack a Level 25 Experiment it hits 9s. How do I make it so it hits two's.

item.title: Npc's hit to high
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

OR YOU CAN JUST EDIT THE NPCHANDLER…in the npchandler it has the equation for hp/10 = max hit, edit that and your good jesus christ. or just add a hitdiff under attack with mage/range etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc's hit to high
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Dude i don’t want to change the hp i just want to make it hit lower…

Read full topic

item.title: Npc's hit to high
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

npc hp / 10 = max hit. and it hits often. you can edit this in the handler where it loads npc.cfg or autospawn.cfg…npc.cfg i think

Read full topic

item.title: Npc's hit to high

item.description:
@system wrote:

Stop flaming each other please

item.title: Npc's hit to high
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

[quote=“Evan`, post:7, topic:172372”][quote author=i am an elf link=topic=232506.msg1989725#msg1989725 date=1200021699]
open npchandler.java and search for this

public boolean AttackPlayer(int NPCID) {

scroll down and look for

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; //chicken attack

use this base code RIGHT under that.

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == X1) { hitDiff = X2 + misc.random(X3);

X1 = This is the ID of the NPC you wish to modify. Just put in any ID of any NPC.
X2 = This is the lowest hit the NPC can hit. Don’t set it to high or you’re players will get owned.
X3 = Most important thing there. This is where you place a low number (10 - 18). This number is added randomally from the lowest number in the set number .

this is in the tut section look…
[/quote]You stupid bitch he wants it to hit LESS get it it keyword is LESS.[/quote]

THIS DOES MAKE IT HIT LESS GET IT??? stupid bitch put lower numbers. my jad hit 80+ before this and i added this and now he maxes 45s. SO STFU and think before you post

Read full topic

this is in the tut section look…[/quote]You stupid bitch he wants it to hit LESS get it it keyword is LESS.

item.title: Npc's hit to high
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Search the ID in NPCHandler.java until you see something like:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == id here) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(9);

Make the first number 0 and the 2nd number 2, so it will hit between a 0 adn a 2

Read full topic
